tool_description: This API provides a simple list of synonyms for a given English word.
name: Simple Synonyms API
title: Simple Synonyms API

api_list.name: Get Simple List Of Synonyms For A Word
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of synonyms for any given English word.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-synonyms-api.p.rapidapi.com/synonyms/dog"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-synonyms-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-synonyms-api.p.rapidapi.com/synonyms/{dog}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-synonyms-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
